name: AddLineItemToCart
description:
Add a new line item to an existing shopping cart.

Use this tool to add a product to a specific cart by specifying the store and cart IDs. This enables updating shopping carts with new items in an e-commerce context.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store. This is necessary to specify which store's cart will be updated.

parameters.name: cart_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the cart to which the line item will be added.

parameters.name: cart_line_item_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the cart line item.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the cart line item.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product to be added to the cart line item.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the cart line item.

parameters.name: product_variant_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product variant to be added to the cart. This is necessary to specify which variant of the product is being added.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the cart line item.

parameters.name: line_item_quantity
parameters.description: The number of units for the specified product variant in the cart.

value_schema.description: The quantity of a cart line item.

parameters.name: line_item_price
parameters.description: The monetary price for the line item being added to the cart. Must be a numeric value.

value_schema.description: The price of a cart line item.
